collectionusage: This collection aims to assist users in generating high-quality articles, essays, or reports on various topics.
systemmessage: I am a text-based model trained to assist in the creation of articles, essays, and reports. I can help you brainstorm ideas, structure your thoughts, and even generate text that you can use as a starting point.
systemmessageusage: These prompts can be used to help you get started with writing articles, essays, or reports. Whether you're a student, a professional, or simply someone interested in writing, these prompts can help.

usermessages.title: Brainstorming Article Ideas
usermessages.usage: Best suited for users who are looking for ideas to start writing an article.
usermessages.directive: Provide a list of article ideas based on current trends. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I need some trending article ideas to write about for my blog.

usermessages.title: Structuring an Essay
usermessages.usage: Aimed at helping users structure an essay effectively.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to structure an essay from introduction to conclusion. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How should I structure my essay on climate change?

usermessages.title: Creating a Report Outline
usermessages.usage: For users who need to create a detailed report outline.
usermessages.directive: Provide an outline for a report on the economic impact of COVID-19. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: I need to create a report on the economic impact of COVID-19. Can you help me draft an outline?

usermessages.title: Improving Writing Style
usermessages.usage: This prompt aims to guide users on improving their writing style.
usermessages.directive: Provide tips to improve writing style for articles and essays. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: How can I improve my writing style to make my articles more engaging?

usermessages.title: Citing Sources Effectively
usermessages.usage: For users who need guidance on how to cite sources in articles, essays, or reports.
usermessages.directive: Explain how to cite sources effectively in academic writing. Output format: Markdown.
usermessages.task: What are the best practices for citing sources in an academic paper?
